= Introduction =

 * Hudson - automated build monitor for Bungeni; runs continuous integration builds and reports back errors
 * Selenium RC - automated test server proxy - runs prepared unit tests on Bungeni using a headless browser


= Pre-requisities =

 * Install Sun Java6 - `sudo apt-get install sun-java6-jdk`

= Setting up Hudson = 

 * Install Tomcat 
 * Get the Hudson war file
 * Deploy the hudson war file
 * Add a build task for bungeni 
   * Add a cron schedule
   * Add  notification parameters
   * Add a build script

= Setting up Selenium RC = 

 * Install selenium

== Running the Selenium tests == 
 
 * Checkout the Selenium tests from svn
 * Start Xvfb with a appropriate display property
 * Export the DISPLAY property
 * Start firefox
 * Run the selenium tests
 * Report back failures
 * Shutdown firefox


 

== Pre-requisites == 
 
 * Install firefox - `sudo apt-get install firefox` 
 * Install Xvfb - `sudo apt-get install Xvfb`
